#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int t,n;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--) {
                scanf("%d",&n);
                long long int i,a[n],b[n],sum=0;
                for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
                        scanf("%lld %lld",&a[i],&b[i]);
                        a[i]=a[i]*b[i];
                        sum=sum+a[i];
                }
                printf("%lld\n",sum);
        }
        return 0;
}
